metadata.title: CVE-2022-4923 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Omnibox in Google Chrome prior to99.0.4844.51 allowed an attacker in a privileged network position toperform a man-in-the-middle attack via malicious network traffic. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
